Hakeem Olajuwon

Pronunciation: \ah-KEEM ah-LAH-zhoo-wahn\

Hakeem Abdul Olajuwon

(formerly Akeem Olajuwon)

(The Dream, Little Moses)

Position: Center ▪ Shoots: Right

7-0, 255lb (213cm, 115kg)

Born: January 21, 1963 in Lagos, Nigeria ng

College: Houston

High School: Muslim Teachers College in Lagos, Nigeria

Draft: Houston Rockets, 1st round (1st pick, 1st overall), 1984 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 27, 1984

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player in 2008 (Full List)

Career Length: 18 years

  • Hall of Fame
  • 12x All Star
  • 2x TRB Champ
  • 3x BLK Champ
  • 2x NBA Champ
  • 12x All-NBA
  • 9x All-Defensive
  • 1984-85 All-Rookie
  • 2x Def. POY
  • 2x Finals MVP
  • 1993-94 MVP
  • NBA 75th Anniv. Team

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Hakeem Olajuwon?

Hakeem Olajuwon is 62 years old.

Where was Hakeem Olajuwon born?

Hakeem Olajuwon was born in Lagos, Nigeria.

When was Hakeem Olajuwon born?

Hakeem Olajuwon was born on January 21, 1963.

How tall is Hakeem Olajuwon?

Hakeem Olajuwon is 7-0 (213 cm) tall.

How much did Hakeem Olajuwon weigh when playing?

Hakeem Olajuwon weighed 255 lbs (115 kg) when playing.

Is Hakeem Olajuwon in the Hall of Fame?

Hakeem Olajuwon was inducted to the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2008 (Full List) .

When was Hakeem Olajuwon drafted?

Hakeem Olajuwon was drafted by Houston Rockets, 1st round (1st pick, 1st overall), 1984 NBA Draft.

What position did Hakeem Olajuwon play?

Center.

When did Hakeem Olajuwon retire?

Hakeem Olajuwon last played in 2002.

What is Hakeem Olajuwon's net worth?

Hakeem Olajuwon made at least $110,291,426 playing professional basketball.

How much did Hakeem Olajuwon make?

Hakeem Olajuwon made $16,700,000 in 2001.

What did Hakeem Olajuwon average?

Hakeem Olajuwon averaged 21.8 points, 11.1 rebounds, and 2.5 assists per game.

How many rings does Hakeem Olajuwon have?

Hakeem Olajuwon won 2 championships.

What schools did Hakeem Olajuwon attend?

Hakeem Olajuwon attended Muslim Teachers College in Lagos, Nigeria and Houston.

What are Hakeem Olajuwon's nicknames?

The Dream, Little Moses are nicknames for Hakeem Olajuwon.
